search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for IRIS CRM (iris-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the direct link to the official pricing page for IRIS CRM: https://www.iriscrm.com/pricing

extracted_content.content:
Merchant Relationship Management: CRM and Underwriting Tools
===============
                     

[![Image 6: NMI Logo Primary](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/themes/nmi/images/NMI_White_Logo_Small.webp)](https://www.nmi.com/)

*   Products
    
    *   *   [![Image 7](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/ICON-NMI-payments.svg)**NMI Payments**The all-in-one, customizable payments platform](https://www.nmi.com/products/nmi-payments/)
        *   [![Image 8](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/ICON-Merchant-Relationship-Management.svg)**Merchant Relationship Management**The unified merchant underwriting & CRM solution](https://www.nmi.com/products/merchant-relationship-management/)
            *   [**Merchant Central**Merchant Management for Residuals, Automated Onboarding and Marketing Automation](https://www.nmi.com/products/merchant-relationship-management/merchant-central/)
            *   [**ScanX / MonitorX**Performs risk assessments with 100+ checks and a risk-scored report in only a matter of minutes.](https://www.nmi.com/products/merchant-relationship-management/underwriting-scanx/)
        *   [![Image 9](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/ICON-Payment-Gateway.svg)**Payment Gateway**Flexible & feature-rich, for every way they want to pay](https://www.nmi.com/products/payment-gateway/)
            *   [**Payment Gateway Extensions**Our payment gateway Marketplace features NMI and trusted 3rd-party Value-Added Services.](https://www.nmi.com/products/payment-gateway/#section_5)
    
*   Solutions
    
    *   *   [**Ecommerce Payments**Simplify online payments](https://www.nmi.com/solutions/ecommerce-payments/)
        *   [**In-Person Payments**Enable in-person payments](https://www.nmi.com/solutions/in-person-payments/)
        *   [**Mobile Payments**Power on-the-go payments](https://www.nmi.com/solutions/mobile-payments/)
        *   [**Unattended & Self-Service**Offer secure self-service payments](https://www.nmi.com/solutions/unattended-self-service-payments/)
        *   [**Fraud Defense Suite**Detect fraud before it happens.](https://www.nmi.com/solutions/fraud-defense-suite/)
    
*   Who We Serve
    
    *   *   [**Independent Sales Organizations (ISOs)**Drive value, earn more](https://www.nmi.com/who-we-serve/independent-sales-iso/)
        *   [**SaaS**Build innovative solutions](https://www.nmi.com/who-we-serve/saas/)
        *   [**Banks**Help your merchants compete](https://www.nmi.com/who-we-serve/banks/)
        *   [**Payment Facilitators**Reduce onboarding friction](https://www.nmi.com/who-we-serve/payment-facilitators/)
        *   [**Industry Verticals**Payments solutions for your customers](https://www.nmi.com/who-we-serve/other-industries/)
    
*   Developers
    
    *   *   [**NEW! Documentation**The resources you need to build](https://docs.nmi.com/)
        *   [**SDKs + APIs**The resources you need to build](https://www.nmi.com/developers/sdks-apis/)
        *   [**Processors & Devices**Pre-certified for easy integration](https://www.nmi.com/developers/processors-devices/)
        *   [**Security**Transact safely, with confidence](https://www.nmi.com/developers/security/)
    
*   Resources
    
    *   *   [**Payments 101**Understanding the world of payments](https://www.nmi.com/resources/payments-101/)
        *   [**Case Studies**Growth stories from our partners](https://www.nmi.com/resources/case-studies/)

        *   [**Whitepapers**Downloadable materials](https://www.nmi.com/resources/whitepapers/)

*   [Blog](https://www.nmi.com/blog/)
*   About Us

Search

![Image 10: Merchant 
Relationship
Management](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/MRM_Header-IMG.png)

For the Entire Merchant Life Cycle

Merchant  
Rel\_
================

Find, underwrite, onboard and support your merchants throughout their entire life cycle. Our unified underwriting and merchant services solution provides everything you need to streamline, save time and monetize while making the most of every customer interaction—from initial outreach to ongoing partnership.

[Get In Touch](https://www.nmi.com/talk-to-our-team/)

Taking Care of Business & People

Enhancing the\_
---------------

Designed for swift underwriting, forecasting and onboarding in minutes, our Merchant  
Relationship Management solution enhances the merchant acquisition process and  
reduces churn by always re-centering on the people behind the payments.

![Image 11](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/dashboard_mrm_graphic.png)

![Image 12: Merchant Central](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/icon_-merchant_central.svg)

### Merchant Central

Manage and grow your portfolio like never before.  Merchant Central is a merchant management  system designed specifically for the payments industry. Streamline operations, improve merchant acquisition, and boost retention with powerful features like sales and lead management, instant onboarding, and precise residuals calculation.

[Get Next-Level Merchant Management](https://www.nmi.com/products/merchant-relationship-management/merchant-central/)

![Image 13](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/underwriting_mrm_graphic.png)

![Image 14: Underwriting and Risk Management](https://www.nmi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/icon_scanx.svg)

### Underwriting and Risk Management

Reduce ongoing risk with automated underwriting that offers unparalleled speed and decreases processing time. NMI ScanX provides instant access to robust risk assessment data that helps you make more informed decisions about merchants—both before and after they are added to your portfolio.

[Stay Ahead of Merchant Risk](https://www.nmi.com/products/merchant-relationship-management/underwriting-scanx/)

Key Benefits of NMI’s Merchant Relationship Management

\_
--

Facilitating instant merchant onboarding and management, all while optimizing for operational efficiency.

### Minimized Friction

Faster underwriting equals faster onboarding, and streamlining the process reduces “not in good order” applications by as much as 30%.

### The Automation Advantage

It’s consistent, thorough and lightning-fast, and means less work (and fewer headaches) for your team.

### More Merchants, Less Churn

By streamlining and improving service and support, resolutions are reached faster and merchants stay “stickier.”

Your Catalyst for Growth in Embedded Payments

\_
--

It’s time to unlock your full growth potential, innovate fearlessly and thrive as an organization with the embedded payments solutions we deliver.
